#summary General controls, and for each character

= General (GAME) =

*<- and ->* Arrow keys to move.

*<-<- and ->->* (double tap) Arrow keys to dash.

*UP* arrow key to jump.

*SPACEBAR* to attack.

*LEFT ALT*
 * *Architect:*
 * *Noble:*
 * *Grenadier:* Reload bullets
 * *Espion:* Leave/Enter stealth
 * *Lancer:*

*LEFT CTRL* to repair walls.
